name: Magnetic vector and scalar data for monitoring and calibration purposes
description: The MAGX_CA_1B Product contains magnetic vector and scalar data for monitoring, TCF.VFM verification, and calibration purposes. It contains raw as well as processed VFM vector measurements, VFM temperatures, and fully converted and corrected ASM measurements at 1 Hz rate. This is essentially the data used for the TCF.VFM estimation but including also the raw VFM data.
variables_table:

Timestamp,-,Time stamp,1,CDF_EPOCH
SyncStatus,-,Synchronization status,1,CDF_UINT2
Latitude,deg,Position in ITRF - Latitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE

dF_AOCS,nT,Magnetic stray field correction intensity of AOCS magneto-torquer coils,1,CDF_DOUBLE

F_error,nT,Error estimate on magnetic field intensity,1,CDF_DOUBLE
F_VFM,nT,"Magnetic field intensity from the VFM instrument,converted and corrected",1,CDF_DOUBLE
